<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.36

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if chat window is enabled. Chat window can be disabled with [[showChat]] command.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''shownChat'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_bool = [[shownChat]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[showChat]], [[showUAVFeed]], [[shownMap]], [[shownArtilleryComputer]], [[shownCuratorCompass]], [[slingLoadAssistantShown]], [[ctrlShown]], [[hcShownBar]], [[shownGPS]], [[shownCompass]], [[shownPad]], [[shownRadio]], [[shownWatch]]
</value></part></template>
